Text:
This cannot be a DVDR.  A DVDR is a clone of a DVD without a reduction in quality (i,e. reduced to .avi or .mkv format).  The file would have to be larger than 4GB for it to be a true DVDR.  What you have here, at 705 MB, is probably an .avi file.

Please learn how to use TPB and its codes and tags, and don't use the Greek alphabet!  It just comes out as gibberish.
